mapper.select: select prod_id, prod_name, prod_price, prod_category, prod_width, prod_height, prod_depth, img_srcs, img_tag, shop_name, shop_address from v_products where prod_id = #{prod_id} and img_tag='thumNail'
select distinct img_srcs, prod_id, img_tag, rownum from v_products where prod_id = #{prod_id} and img_tag='detail' order by rownum

select distinct up_id, prod_id, prod_price, grade, discount_rate, (100 - discount_rate)*0.01*prod_price as used_price from v_used_products where prod_id = #{prod_id} and sale_date is Null order by used_price DESC
